title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 97.9 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 97.9 - Severability

State Regulations

If any provision of this Part or the application thereof to any person or circumstance is adjudged invalid by a court of competent jurisdiction, such judgment shall not affect or impair the validity of the other provisions of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
97.9

Amended, New

York State Register, Volume XXXVI, Issue 25, effective
6/25/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
